com.att.research.xacml.std.datatypes

Class RFC822Name

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.att.research.xacml.std.datatypes.RFC822Name
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    SemanticString, java.lang.Comparable<RFC822Name>

    public class RFC822Name
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.lang.Comparable<RFC822Name>, SemanticString
    RFC822Name represents an RFC 822 name consisting of a local part and a domain part.
    Version:
    $Revision: 1.3 $
    Author:
    car

      • match

        public boolean match(java.lang.String pattern)
        Determines if the given RFC822Name matches this RFC822Name, which may either be a full name or a pattern, using the XACML rules for matching RFC822 names.
        Parameters:
        pattern - the String pattern to match against
        Returns:
        true if this RFC822Name matches the given RFC822Name
